Title: 【Step-by-Step Guide】2024 YouTube Side Hustle｜How to Use AI to Mass-Produce 365 Short Videos in One Hour and Earn $30,000 a Month! No Face! No Filming!
Content: Using AI tools like ChatGPT and Canva can significantly increase video production efficiency.
Emotional short videos are popular due to their heart-touching content, making them suitable for a broad audience.
By creating video templates in bulk, you can quickly produce a large amount of content, reducing repetitive work.
Plan video topics and scripts wisely, using AI tools to generate engaging content.
